ACCEPTED_DELIVER_DOCUMENT.message: Very well. I have transferred the document to you.

ACCEPTED_DELIVER_MESSAGE.message: Excellent. I have copied the message to your computer.

ACCEPTED_PRIVATEER.message: Good. I think you will find the ship very quickly.

ACCEPTED_TRAITOR.message: OK. I've transferred the data to your ship's computer.

ADTEXT_1.message: Find a person in the {system} system. Reward {cash}.

ADTEXT_2.message: Search mission in the {system} system. Payment {cash}.

ADTITLE_2.message: PILOT FOR A SEARCH MISSION NEEDED

DENY_1.message: Excuse me Sir, but I need a pilot who has more experience.

DISTANCE.description: Distance in space, between two locations

FAILUREMSG_1.message: I'm not satisfied with your performance. I won't pay you!

FAILUREMSG_2.message: You are too late! Sorry, you won't get paid!

GREETING_DELIVER_DOCUMENT.message: Damn, you got me. OK, I have signed the document. Please return it to {client}!

GREETING_DELIVER_MESSAGE.message: Thank you for the message. I have transmitted an answer for {client} to your ship's computer.

GREETING_EVACUATION.message: Heaven, it's nice to see you! We can take off immediately. There's nothing keeping me here anymore.

GREETING_PRIVATEER.message: Uh, you work for {client}? I have copied valuable data to your ship's computer. {client} will find this useful!

GREETING_TAXI.message: Oh, no. That's bad news. Let's fly back immediately.

GREETING_TRAITOR.message: What? {client} wants a statement? OK, please return and hand over this document!

HOW_MUCH_TIME.message: How much time do I have?

HOW_MUCH_TIME_DELIVER_MESSAGE.message: If I don't hear from you by {date}, I will hire another pilot!

HOW_MUCH_TIME_EVACUATION.message: You have to be back by {date}! If not, we are in serious trouble.

HOW_MUCH_TIME_PRIVATEER.message: If you're not back by {date}, our deal's over!

HOW_MUCH_TIME_TRAITOR.message: Time is critical! If you're not back by {date}, we're finished.

HOW_TO_DELIVER_DOCUMENT_FEMALE.message: Find her ship. Then you'll find her.

HOW_TO_DELIVER_DOCUMENT_MALE.message: All you have to do is locate his ship. He shouldn't be far away.

HOW_TO_DELIVER_MESSAGE_FEMALE.message: All I know is that she's supposed to be working at a space station.

HOW_TO_DELIVER_MESSAGE_MALE.message: He works in an office near a spaceport. That's all I know.

HOW_TO_EVACUATION_FEMALE.message: She will certainly contact you if she finds out that you arrived!

HOW_TO_EVACUATION_MALE.message: He will contact you when he realizes you've arrived!

HOW_TO_PRIVATEER_FEMALE.message: She very often scraps her ship through dangerous missions. A spaceship workshop would be a good place to start.

HOW_TO_PRIVATEER_MALE.message: He does a lot of risky runs. His ship is often found in the workshop of a space station.

HOW_TO_TAXI_FEMALE.message: I don't know. That's up to you!

HOW_TO_TAXI_MALE.message: I have no idea. That's your business!

HOW_TO_TRAITOR_FEMALE.message: Knowing her well, she hangs out in bars near spaceports.

HOW_TO_TRAITOR_MALE.message: He's been known to hang out in spaceport taverns.

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_DOCUMENT_FEMALE_1.message: Greetings! I'm {client} and I speak for the {company}. One of our ships had a collision with another vessel just a few seconds before entering hyperspace. There wasn't enough time to stop the hyperjump sequence. Now we need someone who can locate the ship with ID number {shipid} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system and hand over a proposal for an out-of-court settlement to Commander {wanted}. Please return to {domicile} for your payment of {cash}. You'll have to travel {dist} ly for this.

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_DOCUMENT_FEMALE_2.message: Nice to meet you. My name is {client}. We are looking for an old business partner who still owes us a favour. Her name is {wanted}. She's gone into hiding in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. If you can find her, hand over an encrypted document and then return to the {company} Office here at {domicile}. We pay {cash} in case of success. {system} is {dist} ly away.

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_DOCUMENT_MALE_1.message: Greetings! I'm {client} and I speak for the {company}. One of our ships had a collision with another vessel just a few seconds before entering hyperspace. There wasn't enough time to stop the hyperjump sequence. Now we need someone who can locate the ship with ID number {shipid} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system and hand over a proposal for an out-of-court settlement to Commander {wanted}. Please return to {domicile} for your payment of {cash}. You'll have to travel {dist} ly for this.

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_DOCUMENT_MALE_2.message: Nice to meet you. My name is {client}. We are looking for an old business partner who still owes us a favour. His name is {wanted}. He's gone into hiding in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. If you can find him, hand over an encrypted document and then return to the {company} Office here at {domicile}. We pay {cash} in case of success. {system} is {dist} ly away.

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_MESSAGE_FEMALE_1.message: Hi, my name is {client}. I'm looking for my stepsister {wanted}. She left the family in anger a few years ago. A friend of mine has seen her recently in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. I would like to see if she is ready for a reconciliation. I pay you {cash} if you can deliver a message to her and return to {domicile} with an answer. Please do it! Will you?

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_MESSAGE_FEMALE_2.message: Hello. I'm {client}. I'm looking for an old friend. Her name is {wanted}. I know she resides in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, but I don't know her exact location. I will pay you {cash} if you can deliver a message to her.

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_MESSAGE_MALE_1.message: Hi, my name is {client}. I'm looking for my stepbrother {wanted}. He left the family in anger a few years ago. A friend of mine has seen him recently in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. I would like to see if he is ready for a reconciliation. I pay you {cash} if you can deliver a message to him and return to {domicile} with an answer. Please do it! Will you?

INTROTEXT_DELIVER_MESSAGE_MALE_2.message: Hello. I'm {client}. I'm looking for an old friend. His name is {wanted}. I know he resides in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, but I don't know his exact location. I will pay you {cash} if you can deliver a message to him.

INTROTEXT_EVACUATION_FEMALE_1.message: Hi. The {company} is in big trouble. Negotiations with an aggressive market competitor in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly, went very badly. Our envoy {wanted} must be evacuated. Communication with her is very limited, so we don't know her exact location. We pay {cash} for this run.

INTROTEXT_EVACUATION_FEMALE_2.message: Hello. Call me {client}. I'm employed by the {company}. Our sales representative {wanted} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, distance {dist} ly, has come into conflict with some dangerous crooks. She doesn't trust the local authorities, so she's gone into hiding. We pay {cash} if you can find her and bring her back to {domicile} safely.

INTROTEXT_EVACUATION_MALE_1.message: Hi. The {company} is in big trouble. Negotiations with an aggressive market competitor in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly, went very badly. Our envoy {wanted} must be evacuated. Communication with him is very limited, so we don't know his exact location. We pay {cash} for this run.

INTROTEXT_EVACUATION_MALE_2.message: Hello. Call me {client}. I'm employed by the {company}. Our sales representative {wanted} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, distance {dist} ly, has come into conflict with some dangerous crooks. He doesn't trust the local authorities, so he's gone into hiding. We pay {cash} if you can find him and bring him back to {domicile} safely.

INTROTEXT_PRIVATEER_FEMALE_1.message: Hi there! My name is {client}. I'm looking for {wanted}. She owes me a lot of money. According to the latest information, she's doing missions in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. Please tell her that my patience is running thin. Return to {domicile} for your payment of {cash}.

INTROTEXT_PRIVATEER_FEMALE_2.message: How are you. I'm Private Investigator {client}. I have to find privateer {wanted} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system and ask her a few questions. Her ship has registration number {shipid}. I can't leave {domicile} right now because of another criminal case. So I would like to outsource this task. I will pay {cash} for this mission.

INTROTEXT_PRIVATEER_MALE_1.message: Hi there! My name is {client}. I'm looking for {wanted}. He owes me a lot of money. According to the latest information, he's doing missions in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. Please tell him that my patience is running thin. Return to {domicile} for your payment of {cash}.

INTROTEXT_PRIVATEER_MALE_2.message: How are you. I'm Private Investigator {client}. I have to find privateer {wanted} in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system and ask him a few questions. His ship has registration number {shipid}. I can't leave {domicile} right now because of another criminal case. So I would like to outsource this task. I will pay {cash} for this mission.

INTROTEXT_TAXI_FEMALE_1.message: Hi. I'm {client}. I'm looking for a relative in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. Her name is {wanted}. Time is of the essence due to a medical emergency in the family. Please find her and bring her back to {domicile}. I pay you {cash}.

INTROTEXT_TAXI_FEMALE_2.message: Good day. I'm Insurance Assessor {client}. A high speed delivery drone failed to set a proper course, broke through a window and damaged the antique wooden furniture inside an apartment seriously. Fortunately no one was injured. But we couldn't locate the owner of the apartment in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system so far. So I will pay you {cash} if you can find her. Her personal presence is necessary to clarify the claim.

INTROTEXT_TAXI_MALE_1.message: Hi. I'm {client}. I'm looking for a relative in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. His name is {wanted}. Time is of the essence due to a medical emergency in the family. Please find him and bring him back to {domicile}. I pay you {cash}.

INTROTEXT_TAXI_MALE_2.message: Good day. I'm Insurance Assessor {client}. A high speed delivery drone failed to set a proper course, broke through a window and damaged the antique wooden furniture inside an apartment seriously. Fortunately no one was injured. But we couldn't locate the owner of the apartment in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system so far. So I will pay you {cash} if you can find him. His personal presence is necessary to clarify the claim.

INTROTEXT_TRAITOR_FEMALE_1.message: Hello, my name is {client}. {wanted} didn't return from a holiday trip to her workplace at the {company}. She was last seen in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. {wanted} has knowledge of some vital business secrets. So we need someone who can get a few answers from her about her ongoing absence. We pay {cash} for this mission. {system} is in a distance of {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_TRAITOR_FEMALE_2.message: Good day. The {company} is searching for an employee who stole some classified documents. Her name is {wanted}. Management calls her a traitor, but wants to give her the opportunity to reconsider and repent. We pay {cash} if you can find her in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, {dist} ly distance, and deliver a message to her.

INTROTEXT_TRAITOR_MALE_1.message: Hello, my name is {client}. {wanted} didn't return from a holiday trip to his workplace at the {company}. He was last seen in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system. {wanted} has knowledge of some vital business secrets. So we need someone who can get a few answers from him about his ongoing absence. We pay {cash} for this mission. {system} is in a distance of {dist} ly.

INTROTEXT_TRAITOR_MALE_2.message: Good day. The {company} is searching for an employee who stole some classified documents. His name is {wanted}. Management calls him a traitor, but wants to give him the opportunity to reconsider and repent. We pay {cash} if you can find him in the {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, {dist} ly distance, and deliver a message to him.

MERCENARY_GREETING_FEMALE_1.message: I'm sorry. Your death is my business!

MERCENARY_GREETING_FEMALE_3.message: You want to meet {wanted}? I will make you meet your maker first!

MERCENARY_GREETING_MALE_1.message: It's nothing personal. I kill you for a fee!

MERCENARY_GREETING_MALE_3.message: You want to meet {wanted}? Over your dead body!

PIRATE_ANSWER_1.message: I have transferred an answer for {client} to you. Good bye.

PIRATE_ANSWER_2.message: Please pass the message I'm currently transferring to you to {client}. Bye.

PIRATE_ANSWER_3.message: Haha, Please tell this {client} I've nothing to say. Have a nice day.

PIRATE_GREETING_1.message: I heard you were looking for me. You have my attention. What do you want?

PIRATE_GREETING_2.message: OK, you got me. Don't waste time and tell me what you want!

PIRATE_GREETING_3.message: I heard you were supposed to give me a message?

PIRATE_TAUNTS_1.message: You want an answer? Well, here it comes!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_2.message: Enough of this! Prepare to go to hell!

PIRATE_TAUNTS_3.message: You actually went all this way to deliver this silly message to me? You better get out of here!

REPEAT_THE_REQUEST.message: Could you please repeat the request?

RISK_EVACUATION_FEMALE_1.message: The situation is tense. We think {wanted} is in danger.

RISK_EVACUATION_FEMALE_2.message: {wanted} is in extreme danger. She should leave the system as soon as possible.

RISK_EVACUATION_MALE_1.message: {wanted} thinks he should leave the system very soon.

RISK_EVACUATION_MALE_2.message: {wanted} is in big trouble! He'd better leave the system sooner than later.

RISK_FEMALE_3.message: I don't know. She's a bit weird.

RISK_FEMALE_4.message: Maybe. {wanted} can be a little quick-tempered sometimes.

RISK_FEMALE_5.message: In my opinion, {wanted} is completely insane. I advise you to be careful!

RISK_MALE_2.message: I expect no trouble. But who knows?

RISK_MALE_3.message: I'm not sure. He's a curious guy.

RISK_MALE_4.message: {wanted} is a paranoid nut. Be careful!

RISK_MALE_5.message: Oh yes indeed. {wanted} is a maniac. You should be prepared for everything!

SUCCESS_ATK_1.message: What? {wanted} attacked you? Please accept this money as compensation!

SUCCESS_ATK_2.message: Really? {wanted} attacked you? Unbelievable! Whatever. I transferred the money.

SUCCESS_ATK_3.message: You met {wanted} and survived? Great! Here's your money.

SUCCESS_INT_1.message: I heard you had trouble. Good to see you after all. I've paid you in full.

SUCCESS_INT_2.message: You had a disagreement with a mercenary? Well, here's your compensation!

SUCCESS_INT_3.message: I just paid you. I heard you had a mercenary on your neck. Great job!

SUCCESS_MSG_1.message: Thank you for this service. I have paid the fee.

SUCCESS_MSG_2.message: Thanks for the service. Your salary has been transferred.

SUCCESS_MSG_3.message: Good job! I have transferred the money.

SUCCESS_MSG_4.message: Thank you very much! I've paid you in full.

SUCCESS_MSG_5.message: You found {wanted}? Great! Here's your payment.

TIP_FEMALE_1.message: I'm not sure, but I think {wanted} is currently at {station}.

TIP_FEMALE_2.message: I think I know the person you are looking for. I have seen her at {station} recently.

TIP_FEMALE_3.message: I know {wanted}. You can find her at {station}.

TIP_FEMALE_4.message: I think I know a person that fits your description. You should visit {station} for more information.

TIP_MALE_1.message: I think {wanted} is currently at {station}. But I'm not sure!

TIP_MALE_2.message: I think I know {wanted}. I have seen him at {station}.

TIP_MALE_3.message: You are looking for {wanted}?. He is currently at {station}.

TIP_MALE_4.message: Your description matches a person I met near {station}.

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_A_CABIN.message: Sorry, you do not have a passenger cabin.
